config.sprinklerBehavior.name: Sprinkler behavior
config.sprinklerBehavior.tooltip:
> Cluster: Groups sprinklers by nearby clustered tiles and tries to water as much as possible.
	 Note: Sprinklers will no longer be able to be activated manually.
> Flood fill: OBSOLETE! Please use the Cluster-family behaviors instead!
	 Custom-made algorithm. Tries to flood fill from the sprinkler/watered tiles.
	 Will also change behavior if next to other sprinklers.
> Vanilla: Uses the default game behavior.
config.ignoreRange.name: Ignore range
config.ignoreRange.tooltip: If enabled, custom sprinkler behaviors will ignore sprinklers' range (calculated basing on their power and coverage shape).
config.waterGardenPots.name: Water garden pots
config.waterGardenPots.tooltip: Whether garden pots should be treated just like other soil.
config.waterPetBowl.name: Water pet bowl
config.waterPetBowl.tooltip: Whether pet bowl should also be watered.
config.waterAtSprinkler.name: Water at sprinkler
config.waterAtSprinkler.tooltip: Whether sprinklers should additionally water their own tiles.
config.compatibilityMode.name: Compatibility mode
config.compatibilityMode.tooltip: Patch the game code in a more mod-compatible way, at the cost of some performance.
config.cluster.section.name: Cluster options
config.cluster.splitDisconnected.name: Split disconneted clusters
config.cluster.splitDisconnected.tooltip:
Make another pass to split big clusters with disconnected parts into separate clusters.
This may come at some performance loss.
config.cluster.ordering.name: Cluster ordering
config.cluster.ordering.tooltip: Which clusters should each sprinkler prefer when choosing one to water more.
config.cluster.betweenClusterBalance.too:
Edge case handling for choosing which cluster to water more.

> Relaxed: May water more tiles
> Restrictive: May water less tiles
config.cluster.inClusterBalance.name: In-cluster balance
config.cluster.inClusterBalance.tooltip:
Edge case handling for choosing which tiles in a cluster to water.

> Relaxed: May water more tiles
> Exact: Will water exactly as many tiles as it should, but those may be semi-random
> Restrictive: May water less tiles
config.activation.section.name: Activation
config.activation.beforeSleep.name: Activate before sleep
config.activation.onPlacement.name: Activate on placement
config.activation.onPlacement.tooltip: Note: this does not work with the Cluster behavior.
config.activation.onAction.name: Activate on action
config.activation.onAction.tooltip: Note: this does not work with the Cluster behavior.
config.coverage.section.name: Coverage
config.coverage.displayTime.name: Display time
config.coverage.displayTime.tooltip: How long (in seconds) should the coverage be displayed for.
config.coverage.animationTime.name: Animation time
config.coverage.animationTime.tooltip: How long (in seconds) should the step-by-step animation play for.
config.coverage.overlayDuplicates.name: Overlay duplicates
config.coverage.overlayDuplicates.toolti: Whether tiles watered by multiple sprinklers should be overlayed (or just shown once).
config.coverage.alpha.name: Alpha
config.coverage.alpha.tooltip:
Transparency of the coverage display.
0: fully transparent
1: fully opaque
config.coverage.onPlacement.name: Show on placement
config.coverage.onAction.name: Show on action
config.sprinklerCoverage.section.name: Sprinkler coverage
config.sprinklerCoverage.section.tooltip: The coverage of each sprinkler tier. If using the "Cluster" behavior, this will only be a hint, not a guarantee.
config.sprinklerCoverage.tier1.name: Tier 1 (Basic)
config.sprinklerCoverage.tier2.name: Tier 2 (Quality)
config.sprinklerCoverage.tier2.tooltip: Coverage of tier 2 (Quality / Basic + Pressure Nozzle) sprinklers.
config.sprinklerCoverage.tier3.name: Tier 3 (Iridium)
config.sprinklerCoverage.tier3.tooltip: Coverage of tier 3 (Iridium / Quality + Pressure Nozzle) sprinklers.
config.sprinklerCoverage.tier4.name: Tier 4 (Iridium + Nozzle)
config.sprinklerCoverage.tier4.tooltip: Coverage of tier 4 (Iridium + Pressure Nozzle) sprinklers.
config.sprinklerCoverage.tier5.name: Tier 5
config.sprinklerCoverage.tier5.tooltip: Coverage of tier 5 sprinklers (if you have mods with such a tier).
config.sprinklerCoverage.tier6.name: Tier 6
config.sprinklerCoverage.tier6.tooltip: Coverage of tier 6 sprinklers (if you have mods with such a tier).
config.sprinklerCoverage.tier7.name: Tier 7
config.sprinklerCoverage.tier7.tooltip: Coverage of tier 7 sprinklers (if you have mods with such a tier).
config.sprinklerCoverage.tier8.name: Tier 8
config.sprinklerCoverage.tier8.tooltip: Coverage of tier 8 sprinklers (if you have mods with such a tier).
